title: A Simple, Sparkly Summer Pound Cake | Thalia Ho
description:

Special thanks to  Genius Tapes listeners, Marian (IG @mariantoro) and Dina! Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell us all about it at genius@food52.com.

itunes:title: A Simple, Sparkly Summer Pound Cake | Thalia Ho
itunes:author: Thalia Ho, Kristen Miglore
itunes:summary: Award-winning Butter and Brioche blogger and author of the nature-inspired dessert book, Wild Sweetness, Thalia Ho shares the 'wild' inspiration behind a genius pound cake recipe. And in the case of this dessert -- it's ALL about the sugar.
itunes:subtitle: Award-winning Butter and Brioche blogger and author of the nature-inspired dessert book, Wild Sweetness, Thalia Ho shares the 'wild' inspiration behind a genius pound cake recipe. And in the case of this dessert -- it's ALL about the sugar.
itunes:keywords: blogger, thalia ho, food podcast, nature inspired book, genius recipes, food52, recipe, dessert, cook book, blog, poundcake, butter and brioche, wild sweetness, the genius podcast, basil sugar pound cakes, basil sugar, seasons, kristen miglore
